name: Gregory and the God of Destruction
name_original: Gregory and the God of Destruction
description:
The fifth game in the Jet Series.

After the events of the last game, Gregory awakens on Earth, meets with the God of Destruction, and has a strange new fate forced upon him.

This game features summaries of the previous four games in the series in case this is your first time with the Jet games or if you want a quick refresher before playing. As usual, this is a fairly cutscene-heavy game.

CONTENT WARNING - This game contains extremely light elements of body horror, but it's better to mention it than not. There's also a sex joke. Wow!

This game was made for the sixth (You)RPGM Game Jam! Go check out the other entries, too: https://itch.io/jam/rpgm-winter-jam/entries 

Check out the other games in the Jet series while you're here:

If Jet Got a Girlfriend: https://minkulus.itch.io/jetgf

Emilia and the Endless Winter: https://minkulus.itch.io/emilia

The Sixth Sentinel and the Dark Lord: https://minkulus.itch.io/sixth

JET IV: After My Wife Died I Finally Retired, But I Got Summoned to Another World Even Though All I Want To Do Is Relax And Fish?!: https://minkulus.itch.io/jet-iv

Alrighty, I think that's everything! Please enjoy this game responsibly!
